reviews.title: What Our Customers Say
reviews.subtitle: Rated 4.3/5 Stars on Google Reviews
reviews.review1: Fast and friendly service! They helped me with my title transfer in no time. Highly recommended!
reviews.review2: Great experience. The staff is very professional and explained everything clearly. Will come back!
reviews.review3: Best place in Hazleton for tags and insurance. Very helpful team and great prices.
reviews.review4: I love that they are open late! Saved me when I needed a notary last minute.

features.title: Why Choose Tata Express?
features.subtitle: We make complex paperwork simple, fast, and stress-free.
features.feature1Desc: Handle your notary, DMV, and insurance needs all in one visit.
features.feature2Desc: We are open when others are closed to fit your busy schedule.
features.feature3Desc: Fully fluent in English and Spanish to serve our community better.
features.feature4Desc: Get your tags and registration instantly without the long wait.
